thread.section_title: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand | acerentalcars.co.nz
thread.title: Vince Midmore.
thread.title_full: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand reviewed by Vince Midmore.

author: Vince Midmore.
title: Vince Midmore.
text: I have no complaints with Ace Rentals Picton office, in fact I thought that the staff there were friendly, efficient and understanding. What annoyed me is the out of office charge of $60 - double that of the competition. We fell foul of that because the Bluebridge ferry was 75 minutes late, not through mechanical failure or bad weather, so I had to take the hit for Bluebridge's mismanagement. If you want a giggle, look at Bluebridge's responses on TripAdvisor; they have even tried to blame the tide - Doooohhh!
